Detailed Description

A RL agent taking optimal decisions.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OptimalAgent::OptimalAgent ( std::istream &  is)

Constructor.

Parameters
isThe 'ifstream' containting the data representing the OptimalAgent to load. (can either be compressed or uncompressed)
OptimalAgent::OptimalAgent ( double  uGamma_ = 0.95)

Constructor.

Parameters
uGammaThe discount factor to use for undiscounted trajectories. (in ]0; 1[);

Return the action to perform on the currently associated MDP from state 'x'. Consists to draw a Optimal action from the action space of the currently associated MDP.
